name: Cancel Culture Simulator
description:
Do you have what it takes to Not be Canceled? 

> Play as a Social Media Manager, extending your clients' agenda on the interwebz.

> Deal with online outrages and the "Cancel Culture."

> Cyberpunk & 80s aesthetics... because everyone's still waiting for CP2077.

> Pursue and buy gifts for your "Cute Crush" with your hard earned income.

> Yet another Desktop Sim (but this one has Twitter in it...!)

Made within 48hrs using Unity 2019.3 for the Game Maker's Toolkit 2020 Gamejam, under the "Out of Control" theme.
